knowledge_panel.description: bayonetta is a hack and slash video game series developed by platinumgames. the franchise was introduced in 2009 with bayonetta. a sequel, bayonetta 2, followed in 2014; bayonetta 3 is in development. all three games star the title character as their protagonist. wikipedia
